<h3 id="X11522">X(11522)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: EXCENTERS-INCENTER REFLECTIONS AND 3rd EULER</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; 3 r + 4 R cos B cos C : :
<br>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3-3*(b-c)^2*a^2+3*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11522) = 3*X(1)+2*X(4)</b>
<p>X(11522) lies on these lines:{1,4}, {2,4301}, {3,9589}, {5,3656}, {8,3817}, {10,5056}, {11,3340}, {12,7956}, {20,551}, {21,5735}, {36,11496}, {40,140}, {56,4312}, {57,11376}, {84,5557}, {145,3854}, {165,962}, {354,9856}, {355,3633}, {381,5881}, {474,5537}, {496,11529}, {499,2093}, {516,3522}, {517,1656}, {519,3091}, {548,3653}, {550,3576}, {908,4853}, {952,3858}, {999,4355}, {1012,5563}, {1158,3337}, {1319,9579}, {1385,1657}, {1389,7704}, {1420,1836}, {1482,3632}, {1537,1768}, {1572,7755}, {1697,11375}, {1709,3333}, {2098,9578}, {2099,9581}, {2646,9580}, {2801,3889}, {3057,5219}, {3062,5542}, {3085,9819}, {3086,3339}, {3149,3746}, {3241,3832}, {3303,4870}, {3304,4654}, {3361,4295}, {3428,5259}, {3515,11365}, {3517,9590}, {3533,6684}, {3545,4677}, {3577,5559}, {3582,6833}, {3584,6834}, {3601,5805}, {3622,4297}, {3627,3655}, {3628,3654}, {3636,5731}, {3649,10085}, {3665,4862}, {3813,8226}, {3828,7486}, {3869,5231}, {3878,5705}, {3894,5693}, {3901,5887}, {4323,5274}, {4325,6938}, {4330,6934}, {4338,6906}, {4345,5261}, {4652,5180}, {4668,5818}, {4816,5844}, {4848,10589}, {5048,10895}, {5073,10246}, {5119,5443}, {5128,5433}, {5226,7320}, {5258,6913}, {5315,5706}, {5550,10164}, {5697,7686}, {5727,10896}, {5748,6736}, {5763,6766}, {5804,10573}, {6361,10165}, {6847,10072}, {6848,10056}, {6912,8666}, {6915,8715}, {6960,10197}, {7678,11526}, {7680,7741}, {7682,10039}, {7992,11034}, {8148,9956}, {8166,10588}, {8187,8196}, {8228,11532}, {8229,11533}, {8377,11527}, {8378,11528}, {8727,11518}, {9711,11530}, {9780,10171}, {9848,11018}, {10826,11009}, {10863,11519}, {10883,11520}, {10886,11521}, {11218,11374}</p>
<p>
X(11522) = midpoint of X(3091) and X(5734)<br>
X(11522) =
reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (1,10595), (1698,8227), (4668,5818), (7987,3616)<br>
X(11522) =
{X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,946,1699), (1,1699,5691), (2,4301,7991), (2,7991,9588), (5,3656,7982), (5,7982,3679), (8,3817,7989), (40,5886,3624), (946,5603,1), (962,1125,165), (962,3523,5493), (1125,5493,3523), (1482,5587,3632), (1482,9955,5587), (3523,5493,165), (3622,9812,4297), (4323,5274,6738), (7988,11531,10), (7989,11224,8), (10896,11011,5727)<br>
